methods.name: addAngularVelocityForItem
methods.summary: Adds a specified angular velocity for the item.

parameters.name: velocity
parameters.summary: Velocity to add or subtract in radians per second. If the current velocity is positive, the item spins clockwise. A negative value means the item spins counter-clockwise.

parameters.name: item
parameters.summary: View object to add to the behavior.

methods.name: addLinearVelocityForItem
methods.summary: Adds a specified linear velocity for the item.

parameters.name: velocity
parameters.summary: Velocity to add or substract in points per second in the x and y directions.

methods.name: angularVelocityForItem
methods.summary: Returns the angular velocity of the item.

methods.name: linearVelocityForItem
methods.summary: Returns the linear velocity of the item.

methods.name: removeItem
methods.summary: Removes the specified item from this behavior.

properties.name: allowsRotation
properties.description: Set to true to enable this behavior or false to disable.

properties.name: angularResistance
properties.summary: Specifies the angular resistance of this item.
properties.description: The greater the value, the greater the angular damping and rotation slows to a stop faster.

properties.name: density
properties.summary: Specifies the relative mass density of this item.
properties.description: An item's density along with its size determines its effective mass and affects its dynamic behavior.

properties.name: elasticity
properties.summary: Specifies the elasticity applied to collisions for this item.
properties.description: A value of 0.0 indicates no bounce upon collision, while 1.0 indicates a completely elastic collision.

properties.name: friction
properties.summary: Specifies the linear resistance of the item when it slides against another item.
properties.description: A value of 0.0 indicates no friction, while 1.0 indicates strong friction. Use higher numbers to apply even higher friction.

properties.name: resistance
properties.summary: Specifies the linear resistance of this item which reduces linear velocity over time.
properties.description: A value of 0.0 indicates no velocity damping.
